content.text:
# Golden Bell Award for Best Supporting Actress in a Television Series

The Golden Bell Award for Best Supporting Actress in a Television Series () is one of the categories of the competition for the Taiwanese television production, Golden Bell Awards. It is presented annually by the Government Information Office, Taiwan. The first time that television programs were first eligible to be awarded was in 1971.
Winners and nominees
:The Best Supporting Actress category was first awarded in 1993.
